pullRequest.title: Add Specialized Recording Support for avro/binary Responses
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #10665
Adds specialized recording support for avro/binary responses to record them as a raw byte array.

commit.message: Add specialized support for avro/binary responses

nodes.bodyText: It might be better to add "avro/binary" as a constant in ContentType.java
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -111,8 +112,13 @@ public PlaybackClient(RecordedData recordedData, Map<String, String> textReplace
 
             String contentType = networkCallRecord.getResponse().get("Content-Type");
 
-            // octet-stream's are written to disk using Arrays.toString() which creates an output such as "[12, -1]".
-            if (contentType != null && contentType.equalsIgnoreCase("application/octet-stream")) {
+            /*
+             * application/octet-stream and avro/binary are written to disk using Arrays.toString() which creates an
+             * output such as "[12, -1]".
+             */
+            if (contentType != null
+                && (contentType.equalsIgnoreCase(ContentType.APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM)
+                    || contentType.equalsIgnoreCase("avro/binary"))) {
